title: User Authentication Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials and proper role-based access control is enforced.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that the user is authenticated and redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.
Ensure JWT token is received and stored securely.

title: User Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails when invalid credentials are entered and appropriate error messages are shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username or password.
Submit the login form.
Verify that login is unsuccessful and an error message is displayed.
Ensure no JWT token or session is created.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify that users cannot access pages or functionalities outside of their assigned roles.

steps.description: Log in as a user with restricted role.
Attempt to access an admin-only page or feature via URL or navigation.
Verify that access is denied with an Unauthorized or Forbidden page displayed.
Attempt to perform restricted actions like creating or modifying sensitive data.
Confirm that operations are blocked and proper error or alert message is shown.

title: Comprehensive Dashboard Data Display
description: Verify that the dashboard loads quickly and displays correct interactive analytics, recent activity, and KPIs.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user with access to the dashboard.
Ensure dashboard page loads within 2 seconds.
Verify that all interactive charts and analytics load and display correct data.
Confirm recent activities and KPIs are up to date and visible.

title: Beneficiary Profile Creation and Data Validation
description: Verify that new beneficiary profiles can be created with all required detailed fields and data validations are enforced.

steps.description: Navigate to beneficiary management page.
Click to create a new beneficiary profile.
Fill out all required fields including personal info, family, financial, health, and documents.
Submit the beneficiary creation form.
Verify successful creation and storage of the beneficiary profile.
Check that validation errors appear when mandatory fields are missing or invalid.

title: Aid Application Multi-Step Process with Bulk Operations
description: Test the multi-stage aid application submission and approval workflow including bulk application operations and history tracking.

steps.description: Log in as an administrator or aid manager.
Navigate to aid application management page.
Submit a new aid application entering required information through multi-step form.
Verify each step validates inputs correctly before allowing to proceed.
Perform bulk selection and bulk approval or rejection of multiple aid applications.
Confirm that bulk operations update application statuses appropriately.
Verify application history tracking shows all status changes and timestamps.

title: Donation Management: Create and Track Donations
description: Verify donor profiles can be created, donations recorded, and donation histories are accurately maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to donation management page.
Create a new donor profile with required details.
Record a new donation linked to the donor.
Ensure donation record appears in donor history with correct details.
Generate tax documents automatically for donations.
Verify generated tax documents are correct and downloadable.

title: Scholarship Application and Monitoring
description: Test student scholarship application submissions, profile updates, and academic performance tracking.

steps.description: Navigate to scholarship application page.
Submit a new application with all required information.
Verify application is stored and visible in the application list with correct status.
Update student profile with academic performance data.
Confirm updated performance data is reflected in monitoring dashboards.

title: Financial Management: Income and Expense Tracking
description: Verify that income and expense records can be created, edited, and bank reconciliations performed correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to financial management page.
Add new income and expense records with valid categories.
Verify records are stored and display correctly.
Perform bank reconciliation against recorded transactions.
Confirm reconciliation matches and discrepancies are flagged.
Generate financial forecast reports.
Verify report data accuracy and export functionality.

title: Bulk Messaging System: Email and SMS Campaigns
description: Test creation, scheduling, sending, and tracking of bulk email and SMS campaigns with template usage.

steps.description: Access messaging campaign management.
Create a new campaign with selected message templates.
Schedule delivery for a future date and time.
Verify campaign is listed and scheduled correctly.
Trigger sending campaign messages.
Confirm all intended recipients receive messages and delivery statuses are tracked.

title: Task, Event, and Meeting Creation and Coordination
description: Verify that tasks, events, and meetings can be created, assigned, and progress tracked with calendar integration.

steps.description: Navigate to task/event/meeting management pages.
Create new tasks, events, and meetings with required information.
Assign tasks and events to team members.
Verify that all created entries appear in calendar views and progress can be updated.

title: Legal Case Management and Document Tracking
description: Test management of legal cases, assignment of lawyers, and document handling with deadline alerts.

steps.description: Navigate to legal case management page.
Create a new case and assign lawyers.
Upload related legal documents.
Verify case details and documents are accessible and deadlines trigger alerts.

title: Offline Support and Background Sync
description: Verify that the app supports offline usage and synchronizes data correctly when network is restored.

steps.description: Simulate network disconnection and use core functionalities.
Make changes such as form submissions or data edits while offline.
Confirm app allows work without errors and queues changes.
Reconnect network and verify changes are synchronized with backend.
Ensure no data loss and background sync completes successfully.

title: Internationalization and RTL Language Support
description: Verify the UI correctly switches between Turkish, English, and RTL languages with proper locale formatting.

steps.description: Change application language to Turkish and verify all UI text updates.
Confirm correct locale formatting for dates, numbers, and currency.
Switch application language to an RTL language.
Verify UI layout switches to right-to-left orientation without layout breaking.

title: WCAG 2.1 AA Accessibility Compliance
description: Test accessibility compliance including keyboard navigation, screen reader support, semantic HTML, and color contrast.

steps.description: Navigate through the application using only keyboard.
Ensure all interactive elements are reachable and focusable in logical order.
Use screen reader to navigate key pages.
Verify screen reader outputs meaningful descriptions and labels.
Check color contrast ratios meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards using automated tools.

title: Form Validation and Multi-Step Form Functionality
description: Verify comprehensive form validation, including required fields, dependent fields, multi-step navigation, and mobile optimization.

steps.description: Access forms in various modules including beneficiary, aid application, and scholarships.
Attempt to proceed in multi-step forms with missing or invalid data.
Verify appropriate validation errors are displayed and progression is blocked.
Test dependent fields show/hide or enable/disable based on input.
Confirm dependent logic works correctly.
Test form behavior on mobile devices ensuring responsiveness and usability.
Verify forms adapt properly and maintain usability on small screens.

title: Security Testing: CSRF Protection and Rate Limiting
description: Verify the system implements CSRF protection on form submissions and enforces rate limiting to prevent abuse.

steps.description: Attempt CSRF attack simulation by submitting forms without valid CSRF tokens.
Verify submission is rejected and appropriate error is returned.
Perform rapid repeated requests exceeding rate limits.
Confirm server responds with rate limit exceeded error and blocks further requests.

title: Notification System Functionality and Delivery
description: Test in-app notifications and push notifications for various events including aid application status and legal deadline alerts.

steps.description: Trigger events that generate notifications (e.g., application status update).
Verify notification appears in the in-app notification bell and is marked as unread.
Enable push notifications on user device.
Confirm push notifications are received correctly.
Mark notifications as read.
Verify read state updates and notifications no longer appear as new.

title: Data Export and Import Accuracy
description: Verify exporting of data to CSV, Excel, PDF, and images and importing from supported formats works correctly with data integrity.

steps.description: Export data sets from various modules like donations, beneficiaries, and finance.
Verify exported files include correct and complete data matching on-screen values.
Import properly formatted data files back into the system.
Confirm imported data is added correctly and any errors or duplicates are handled gracefully.

title: System Settings and Backup Management
description: Verify system settings configuration options and data backup/recovery workflows operate correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to system settings page.
Modify settings such as security, notifications, and backup schedules.
Confirm changes persist and apply correctly.
Trigger manual backup of data.
Verify backup completes successfully with confirmation.
Perform data recovery using backup.
Confirm system is restored to expected state without data loss.

title: Performance Benchmark Verification
description: Test application performance benchmarks including page load times under 2 seconds and API response times below 500ms under normal load.

steps.description: Access multiple key pages across the application.
Measure and verify pages load within 2 seconds.
Send API requests for common data retrieval.
Verify API responses complete in under 500 milliseconds.

title: Load Testing for 100% User Support
description: Verify system supports 100% expected user concurrency without performance degradation or failures.

steps.description: Simulate full user load on the system using load testing tools.
Verify system uptime is maintained above 99.5% and no critical errors occur.
Ensure average page load and API response times remain within acceptable ranges.

title: Disaster Recovery Process Validation
description: Test documented disaster recovery process for restoring system functionality after critical failure.

steps.description: Simulate disaster scenario affecting data availability or system function.
Follow recovery procedures to restore system using backups and failover mechanisms.
Confirm full restoration of data integrity and system operations.

title: User Profile Update and Role Management
description: Verify users can view and update their profile information and that administrators can manage user roles and permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a regular user and navigate to profile page.
Modify personal information and save changes.
Verify updated information is persisted and displayed correctly.
Log in as admin and navigate to user management.
Change roles and permissions for selected users.
Confirm role changes take effect and access controls are updated.

title: Security Audit Results: Zero Critical Vulnerabilities
description: Ensure security audit reports show zero critical vulnerabilities and all security controls function as expected.

steps.description: Perform automated security scans including OWASP Top 10 checks.
Conduct manual penetration testing on critical modules.
Verify no critical vulnerabilities are identified.
Confirm all implemented security features such as CSRF protection, encryption, and secure token management are operational.
